/* Configuration preview scan Is the data on your passport fully\n visible, glare free and not blurred? Is the data on your ID fully visible,\n glare free and not blurred? Information Extracted! /**************************************************************************/ /* Passport Scan */ Scan Passport Place your document within the frame until it is captured automatically Place your document within the frame as it is shown in the image above. The capturing happens automatically.\n\nEnsure that all data is readable\n and avoid reflection. How to scan your passport Searching Document... PXXX<<XXXXXXXX<<<<<<<<\nXXXXXXXXXXXXX<<<<<<<<< Step 1 of 2 /**************************************************************************/
/**************************************************************************/ /* License Scan */ Scan ID Step 1 of 2 Step 2 of 2
Searching Document... On stand-by Come closer Align document to frame Keep steady Blur detected. Tap on screen to auto-focus /**************************************************************************/ /* License Scan FRONT */ Place your document within the frame until all 4 edges are aligned and it is captured automatically Place your document within the frame as it is shown in the image above. The capturing happens automatically.\n\nEnsure that all data is readable\n and avoid reflection. How to scan your ID Front Front /**************************************************************************/
/**************************************************************************/ /* License Scan BACK */ Place the barcode in front of the camera until it is captured automatically Place the barcode in front of the camera as it is shown in the image above. The capturing happens automatically. How to scan your ID No Barcode on my ID Back Back
There is none on my ID No barcode/MRZ detected. /**************************************************************************/
/**************************************************************************/ /* Selfie Scan */ Selfie Step 2 of 2 How to capture a selfie Follow the two step process and align your face with the frame. Hold your device on eye level and look straight into the camera. Your face will be captured automatically. On stand-by Is your face fully visible,\n glare free and not blurred? Face Extracted!
Please check your internet connection
Auto-capture is too slow\nPress button to capture manually Unable to find identification in frame Document image is blurry. Please tap on the screen, over the document, to bring the document into focus Low lighting condition detected
